abstract: Hilarie M Sheets Inside Art column; James Cohan Gallery launches third satellite location in former fish market on Lower East Side; new space at 291 Grand Street opens October 31, 2015 with show of Robert Smithson’s rarely seen Pop works.
lead_paragraph: A former fish market will become the third outpost of the James Cohan Gallery.

headline.main: James Cohan Gallery Expands to Lower East Side

snippet: A former fish market will become the third outpost of the James Cohan Gallery.
